name: Wam Digital
description:
We design and develop mobile, web, and online advertising media with the same standards, methodologies, tools and technologies, used in the United States.
We like to say we have three main assets that define us:
• Proven experience, we’ve worked with some of the world’s major brands.
• Proven capabilities, from e-commerce to fashion apps to medical visual aides in 5 different languages, we’ve done it.
• Proven competitively, our detailed and viable quotes are the result of over 15 years experience in the field.
